import React, { useState, useEffect, forwardRef, useContext } from "react"; import styles from "./Footer.module.css"; import {LoginContext} from "../../contexts/reducers/loginContext"; import Link from "next/link"; import { useRouter } from "next/router"; const Footer = forwardRef((props, ref) => { const history = useRouter(); const [loginState, loginDispatch] = useContext(LoginContext); const isLoggedIn = loginState.isLoggedIn; const user = loginState.user; const [emailInput, setEmailInput] = useState(); useEffect(() => { if (isLoggedIn && user && user.email) { setEmailInput(user.email); } }, [isLoggedIn, user]); const onEmailChange = (e) => { setEmailInput(e.target.value); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); history.push(`login/email=${emailInput}`); }; return (
{isLoggedIn && user && user.isSubscribed ? (

); }); export default Footer;
